item.title: Dollar Keeps Rising Supported by Yields
item.description: The dollar continued to strengthen, supported by rising Treasury yields, as investors bet Trump policies will support both growth and inflation.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed as Bond Yields Rise and Bitcoin Sets Another Record
item.description: The S&P 500 and Dow rose, while the Nasdaq retreated and bond yields climbed.

item.title: Elliott Calls for Split at Honeywell, Discloses $5 Billion Stake in Conglomerate

item.title: Surging Defense Stocks Are Asia's Trump Trade
item.description: Asian defense stocks have been on fire as global military spending rises. A second Trump presidency could keep them going.

item.title: Metal Prices Fall on Strong Dollar, Rising Chinese Copper Output
